forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers this morning, becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this morning, becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Thunder possible. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High around 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 15C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 57F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
